FKE Academic Awards in the 68th UTM Convocation
===============================================

by [cmedpic](https://fke.utm.my/author/cmedpic/ "Posts by cmedpic")
 | Nov 18, 2024 | [CMED](https://fke.utm.my/category/cmed/)
, [Faculty](https://fke.utm.my/category/faculty/)

![](https://fke.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/WhatsApp-Image-2024-11-21-at-11.14.12-AM-980x735.jpeg)

**CONGRATULATIONS GRADUATES !**

Dear award recipients, faculty would like to invite graduates to the Award Giving Session.

Details as follows :

Date : 17 November 2024 (Sunday)  
Time : 2.30pm  
Venue : Foyer P19a.

**SESSION TENTATIVE**

2.30 pm  
– Arrival of Award Recipients  
– Academic Award Giving Session  
– Photography Session  
– End of Session

**List of Academic Award Recipients :**

**Vice – Chancellor Award**  
1\. Hoh Chew Wen- Bachelor of Engineering (Electrical- Mechatronics)

**Academic Excellence Award**  
1\. Hoh Chew Wen- Bachelor of Engineering (Electrical- Mechatronics)  
2\. Fang Wei Qiang- Bachelor of Engineering (Electrical- Mechatronics)  
3\. Kenny Chan Jie Huie- Bachelor of Electronic Engineering with Honours

**Alumni Prize Award**  
1\. Fang Wei Qiang- Bachelor of Engineering (Electrical- Mechatronics)  
2\. Lim Kai Yi- Bachelor of Biomedical Engineering with Honours

**Board of Engineers Malaysia Academic Excellence Award**  
1\. Teo Jing Wei – Bachelor of Engineering (Electrical- Mechatronics)

e-book 68th UTM Convocation (MK68)

> [Convocation Book](https://convocation.utm.my/galeri-buku-konvokesyen/)
